comment: Very helpful, incredibly sweet, and always approachable. Clearly enjoys the material which made it interesting. Played one documentary per section which added a lot of interest to material. Made it very obvious what information would be on exam. Take this professor!

Lecture style, clear cut and simple ideas. Come to class to get the answers for tests. 4 tests, gives you the terms and could just use straight memorization. Tests are easy, just write 3 bullet points. Offers help & lots of office hours. Very simple class. Always happy & cheery. Never taken US history before & I thoroughly enjoyed her class.
Lecture style teacher with little connectivity.  Just spit out information.  Nothing to verify that she's getting through.
